theInvoker:InvokePower.NAME: Invoke
DESCRIPTIONS: When you have three channelled orbs, gain a spell card at the start of your turn based on the orbs you have channelled.

theInvoker:VenomPower.NAME: Venom
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack apply #b
#yPoison.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next
turn
#b
turns
gain 1 #yEnergy

theInvoker:ForgeSpiritPower.NAME: Forge Spirit
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, deal %1$s%2$s damage to a random enemy.

theInvoker:MultiStrikePower.NAME: Multi-Strike
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next basic Attack card is played %1$s time(s).

theInvoker:EchoShellPower.NAME: Echo Shell
DESCRIPTIONS: The next %1$s time(s) you are attacked reflect the damage back to the attacker.

theInvoker:EndOfRoundDamagePower.NAME: Sun Strike
DESCRIPTIONS: This enemy will suffer %1$s damage at the end of this round.

theInvoker:EndOfTurnDamagePower.NAME: Delayed Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: Creature suffers %1$s damage at the end of its turn.

theInvoker:EndOfTurnHealPower.NAME: Delayed Healing
DESCRIPTIONS: Creature heals %1$s at the end of its turn.

theInvoker:FalsePromisePower.NAME: False Promise
DESCRIPTIONS: %1$s damage is delayed until the end of next turn.

theInvoker:AphoticShieldPower.NAME: Aphotic Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: If you take damage this turn, the shield explodes for %1$s damage to all enemies.

theInvoker:IonShellPower.NAME: Ion Shell
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this enemy's turn, all other enemies take %1$s damage.

theInvoker:MultiStrikeRoundStartPower.NAME: Moon Shard
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain %1$s #yMulti-Strike.

theInvoker:TrackPower.NAME: Bounty
DESCRIPTIONS: If enemy dies this turn, gain %1$s Gold.

theInvoker:ShadowPoisonPower.NAME: Shadow Poison
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this round, this enemy will take %1$s damage.
At the end of next round, this enemy will take %1$s damage.

DESCRIPTIONS: You applied #b
keyword.
keywords.
